text: {{Infobox Settlement |name = Baldia |settlement_type = Town |image_skyline = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = Baldia Town Karachi.PNG |map_caption = Union Councils of Baldia Town |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Pakistan |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Sindh |subdivision_type2 = City District |subdivision_name2 = Karachi |parts_type = Union Councils |parts_style = list, coll |parts = 8 |p1 = Ittehad Town Gulshan-e-Ghazi Islam Nagar Muhajir Camp Muslim Mujahid Colony Nai Abadi Rasheedabad Saeedabad |government_footnotes = |government_type = Town Council |leader_title = Town Nazim |leader_name = Kamran Akhtar |leader_title1 = Naib Nazim |leader_name1 = Zahid Mehmood |leader_title2 = Municipal Officer |leader_name2 = Ghulam Shabbir |established_title = Established |established_date = 14 August 2001 |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |population_as_of = 1998 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 406165 |timezone = |utc_offset = |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = | blank_name = | blank_info = | blank1_name = | blank1_info = | blank2_name = | blank2_info = |footnotes = }} Baldia Town is the largest town of Karachi, Pakistan. It is bordered by SITE Town and Orangi to the east. It is bordered by Kiamari Town to the north and west. 97% of the people are Muslim. Category:Towns in Sindh Category:Geography of Karachi
title: Baldia Town
